display_information.name: BF Karma
display_information.description: Reward colleagues with karma for their help and initiative
display_information.long_description: The Karma Bot for Slack helps foster a positive work culture by encouraging employees for their contributions and support of their colleagues. Through the bot, users can award karma using Slack reactions and commands. The bot also allows viewing the history of all karma transactions and tracking team achievements through a leaderboard, promoting team spirit and motivation.

slash_commands.description: Check the current karma balance for yourself or any user
View the leaderboard for karma points.
Show all available commands and their descriptions
View the history of karma transactions (last 10 entries). For yourself or another user
Give karma to another user with an optional description of why.
Verify the integrity of the karma history
Burn karma from yourself and another user
Anonymously burn karma from yourself and another user
